ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He called upon his Lord: 'I am overwhelmed, so help me!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So he prayed to his Lord: "I am helpless, deliver me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he called upon His Lord: “Verily I am vanquished; so come You to my aid.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Noah prayed, "Lord, help me; I am defeated".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He therefore prayed to his Lord, “I am overpowered, therefore avenge me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he invoked his Lord (saying): "I have been overcome, so help (me)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore he called upon his Lord: I am overcome, come Thou then to help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And so he called unto his Lord, saying, 'I am vanquished; do Thou succour me!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So he cried unto his Lord, saying: I am vanquished, so give help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so he cried out to his Lord, saying, "I am overcome, so help me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thereupon he prayed Unto his Lord: verily am overcome, so vindicate me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereat he invoked his Lord, [saying,] ‘I have been overcome, so help [me].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then he called on his Lord: "I am one overcome: do Thou then help (me)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he invoked his Lord (saying): "I have been overcome, so help (me)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then he supplicated to his Lord, (saying): 'I am overcome, help me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So he appealed to his Lord, “I am overwhelmed, so help me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:10] And so he invoked his Lord, [saying,] ‘I have been (annī, to be understood as bi-annī) overcome, so help [me]!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So he cried unto his Lord, saying: I am vanquished) I am oppressed, (so give help) by punishing them.
